project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Users can see when the other party is typing
Messages are displayed in correct chronological order
non_functional: System should handle at least 10,000 concurrent users
Message delivery latency should be under 1 second in 95% of cases

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-to-one or group video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start a video call from a chat window
Video and audio quality remain stable with latency under 300ms in 95% of cases
Participants can mute/unmute audio and enable/disable video during the call
Calls can handle at least 4 participants without quality degradation
non_functional: Video resolution should be at least 720p under good network conditions
Audio should have less than 100ms jitter in 95% of cases

notes: Assumed that the application will support both web and mobile platforms; group messaging and group video calls are included as part of the scope.
